programme.title: It's Always Sunny In Philadelphia Yr 16
programme.desc: The guys crash Dee's bowling league night and compete in a Battle of the Sexes at a bowling alley owned by the McPoyles. Dee, The Waitress, Artemis, and Gail the Snail versus Dennis, Mac, Charlie, and Frank in a classic match to prove once and for all who has the upper hand in sports.

programme.title: The Mekong River With Sue Perkins
programme.desc: In this fourth and final episode, Sue reaches her final destination - China, home to the source of this mighty river. Here change is sweeping through faster than any other Mekong nation, as China's economic miracle transforms even the remotest regions. Arriving in Yunnan's tropical south-western region of Xishuangbanna, Sue discovers how this once remote and sleepy region is now home to a booming tourist industry, with the indigenous Dai tribe at its heart.

programme.title: 6-Headed Shark Attack
programme.desc: Attendees of a marriage boot camp on a remote island have to fight a 6-headed shark that attacks the beach.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends
programme.desc: This heart-warming and fascinating series brings you the most surprising animal friends from around the world. We travel the globe to track down the cutest, funniest and most unusual animal relationships and bring you the delightful and compelling stories behind these bizarre animal bonds.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons
programme.desc: Winter is the ultimate challenge for wildlife across America. Will they escape to milder southern climates or stay put and tough out the season? See how different creatures respond to the brutal cold and blizzards that blanket the North.

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S7
programme.desc: Sloppy and the Triangle Aliens are tasked with cleaning up - their least favorite chore. To help them take care of the clutter in their living room, they create the ultimate vacuum which ends up sucking everything in the house, including themselves, into an alternate realm. Together, they have to find their way out so they can get back to Mr Triangle Man's party. It's Ollipolis's founding anniversary and the townspeople are celebrating by putting up a grand ballet.

programme.desc: Toby has a terrible fall and his brothers feel responsible. They start being very nice to Toby to make up for it. But what if Toby is hiding a secret from his brothers? The children find and rescue Captain Redbeard's special friend who went missing.

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings S2
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the ranger's collection of bird calls by chance. With a simple blow of the whistle, he can attract a flock of partridges that are at his beck and call. For Grizzy, it's a super-practical way of being waited on by feathered servants, while the Lemmings see it as a golden opportunity to have a squadron which obeys at the drop of a dime.

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings S2
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a magician's hat that tosses out objects stored inside beforehand with the tap of a magic wand. He decides to impress his beloved she-bear with a magician's act. But he will have to work around the Lemmings, who have the gift of coming out of the hat at the wrong moment.

programme.title: Moka's Fabulous Adventures
programme.desc: Moka, the King of the Savannah's son, a naive and reckless little crocodile, leaves home one day to go explore his vast kingdom. Cherry, a brave rhinoceros from the Royal Guard is sent along to insure his protection. But much to her despair, Moka's insatiable curiosity and impulsive behavior are constantly getting them into trouble!

programme.title: After Love
programme.desc: Derek confronts Skylar about the coincidences that dont add up. Skylar, under much duress, admits that she can see Ryan. Derek freaks out and lashes out at her, connecting her to all the misery and mystery. But Skylar is equally freaked by the coincidences. She investigates on her own. And it leads her to a truth that shocks her. Skylar was the doctor treating the taxi driver on the day of the accident...

programme.title: Transplant S2
programme.desc: Bash faces an ethical dilemma, caught between a gang member with a gunshot wound and the police officer looking for him.

programme.title: World Sailing Show
programme.desc: The World Sailing Show is the official international sailing series of the sailing federation World Sailing and is a monthly digest of everything that matters in the sport. From Olympic sailing to the round the world races and the America's Cup, the show includes personality profiles of the top players and technical features from the cutting edge of the sport where the access provided behind the scenes at major events is unparalleled.

programme.title: Animals Unleashed
programme.desc: Animals Unleashed is a user-generated content show that features the most unpredictable and hilarious animal clips from around the world. From the wild to the living room, each episode showcases animals at their most surprising, mischievous and outrageous! Each action-packed episode features the very best animal clips available packaged into related segments, features, or even games, all with highly-entertaining narration.

programme.title: New Amsterdam S1
programme.desc: After becoming the medical director of one of the United States's oldest public hospitals, Dr Max Godwin sets out to reform the institution's neglected and outdated facilities to treat the patients.

programme.title: Starstruck UK S1
programme.desc: Members of the public will be transformed into their most beloved music star for one night only. But they won't be alone as they will perform as trios who all share a love for their chosen star. One trio will face each other in the finale.

programme.title: The Wall UK S2
programme.desc: The Wall is a wildly unpredictable, fast and simple game show with huge cash sums on the line. Two players must work together to tackle the mammoth four-storey-high wall. Emotions run high as the pair's faith in one another is tested by unpredictable outcomes and ever-rising stakes. The rules are simple. If the players answer a trivia question correctly, the ball turns green as it falls randomly down the wall towards slots of varying cash amounts.

programme.title: Island Feast With Peter Kuruvita S2
programme.desc: One of Indonesia's many islands, Sulawesi is home to unique vistas, familiar seaside aromas and friendly locals hailing from hundreds of ethnicities. Chef Peter Kuruvita is lured first to the island's capital of Makassar where he is delighted by the treasures offered by local fishing culture at the markets.

programme.title: 金色大道

programme.title: 世界第一等 S13
programme.desc: 就像只有在冰岛能吃到鲸鱼肉，在非洲吃骆驼肉也是一件非常有当地特色的事情， Blend Gourmet Burger，是在当地有名的骆驼肉汉堡店。肉的纤维有一点粗，不同于我们常能吃到的肉类，不少外国客争相尝鲜，甚至开玩笑说，吃过骆驼肉就可以正式变身非洲Local胃了！本次有摩洛哥旅游达人，唐宏安带路，带第一等小组到索维拉，海鲜烧烤街，由于索维拉靠海，所以现捞海味绝对新鲜，其中怎么在人潮众多的烧烤街中，喊价选购，怎么吃最划算 通通都由旅游达人带路，带大家一饱口福。 独一无二的精彩片段，千万别错过.

programme.title: 夜光神杯
programme.desc: 传说中有一个夜里会发光的杯子，谁要是得到它，谁就可以许三个愿望…… 天上世界，女娲娘娘降服千年蜈蚣精，以好善之德将小蜈蚣罩在杯中，并命小仙子杯仙负责看守，谁知杯仙误信蜈蚣精让它逃跑。女娲惩罚小仙子将杯子流入凡间，谁若有缘拾起，注水入杯中，便可成为杯仙的主人，并可提出三个愿望。杯仙必须待奉满一千个主人，方可考虑重新位列仙班。 从此，民间就流传一个传说：有一个夜里会发光的神杯能为人实现任何愿望….

programme.title: 四大名厨

programme.desc: 千年前的《泗州志》留下预言，人与自然需要达成平衡，否则将引发一场毁灭世界的灾难。在灾难来临之前，必须分别找齐三个世界的三把钥匙，获得拯救世界的机会。但正如历史所证明的那样，人与自然的平衡并不是一件容易的事情。因为人类和动物总是会引发一些问题。无论他们是不是有意为之，但往往会过度开发，过度使用他们的环境，破坏精妙的生态平衡，并将这个世界送上毁灭的道路。幸运的是，骄傲勇敢的水精灵带领伙伴们组成了一支强大的环保特攻队。他们将勇敢地面对这场危机，并不惜一切代价拯救湿地世界，为后代保护好这个世界。.

programme.title: 危险的约定

programme.title: 光照不到的角落
programme.desc: (PG) 每座繁华的都市背后都隐匿着超载的危机。随着现代化和城市化的加速，越来越多乡镇人口及外来移民涌入城市，居住危机成了未来国际社会最大的难题之一。城市中的「贫民窟」因而迅速发展。根据联合国的统计，世界有32亿人居住在城市，而将近10亿人生活在城市的阴暗角落。城市贫民窟无疑为城市的发展带来沉重的负担。这个节目旨在探索各大著名城市意想不到的「低端人口」聚集地，以及那里的生活状况，挖掘近在眼前，却不为人知晓的城市面貌，看看每座城市在高速发展下被悬置的居住难题，而当地人又准备怎么处理这些危机。.

programme.title: 光照不到的角落
programme.desc: (PG)(重) 每座繁华的都市背后都隐匿着超载的危机。随着现代化和城市化的加速，越来越多乡镇人口及外来移民涌入城市，居住危机成了未来国际社会最大的难题之一。城市中的「贫民窟」因而迅速发展。根据联合国的统计，世界有32亿人居住在城市，而将近10亿人生活在城市的阴暗角落。城市贫民窟无疑为城市的发展带来沉重的负担。这个节目旨在探索各大著名城市意想不到的「低端人口」聚集地，以及那里的生活状况，挖掘近在眼前，却不为人知晓的城市面貌，看看每座城市在高速发展下被悬置的居住难题，而当地人又准备怎么处理这些危机。.
